input.sentences: on the beach for a day of kite flying .
it 's a very windy day and holding the kite is hard work but fun .
glad friends showed up to help hold the kite .
racing along with friends and family .

output.sentences: It was as great day to visit the beach for kite flying.
The wind was good enough to launch the kite in the sky.
Everyone was so glad to watch the kite fly.
Families gathered around to to watch in kite carts.
Everyone decided to get into the fun day of kite racing.
